The claim was made in a graphic publishe: 2020, and has been shared more than 200 times.
The text in the graphic states that the: 19 death rate without a vaccine is lower than the flu death rate with a vaccine.
Multiple international health experts: including Dr. Lisa Maragakis from Johns Hopkins University and Peter Julian Cayton from the University of the Philippines Pandemic Response Team, have refuted the claim and provided evidence that the Covid-19 death rate is higher than the flu death rate.
